text:
June 6, 1957
Mr, Ralph H. Hall, Coordinator
Audio-Visual Center
Kent State University
Kent, Ohio
Dear Ralph*
I think we're making progress. Want to
firm up any of this? Then maybe we can
feet going.
Our best.
Harry J, Skornia
Executive Director
HJS/dfc
Enclosure Photo of Wright letter (ETRC) of June 4> 1957
